salaryExpectations: LKR 60,000 (Licensed Electrician) to LKR 200,000+ (Supervisor/Contractor) per month.
futureOutlook: There is a significant shortage of professionally qualified and licensed electricians in Sri Lanka. The construction boom and the increasing use of electrical appliances create constant demand. Electricians specializing in industrial automation (PLCs) or solar power installation have even higher earning potential. Many build successful contracting businesses.
